translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The letter from Your Excellency Father Francisco Terroba has been presented to the Government, requesting the erection of a chapel at the Itaqui pass, concerning which Your Excellency Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency Justice Secretariat in Alegrete, September 26, 1842. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Father Francisco das Chagas Martins Ávila e Sousa, Apostolic Vicar. José Pedroso de Albuquerque.

The letter with Barbacena’s opinion on means to end the war follows.
